note.p: Burial: Under the communion table in the church of Offley, Hertfordshire
Education: Privately in France; Westminster School; Lincoln's Inn (admitted 1657); Trinity College, Cambridge; BA (1658), MA (1662)
Career: Fellow of Trinity Hall, Cambridge (1662-1687); Gresham Professor of Law (1673-1687); Secretary to Sir William Temple (1674-1680); Master in Chancery (1688-1700)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Venn; Hunter; Ward; GEC Baronetage; LI
